Extract organ event data for recoding

categorize_organevent.Rd

Extract organ event data for recoding

Usage

categorize_organevent(
  data,
  stcs,
  .organevent_category = c("Allograftdisease", "Complications", "Underlyingdisease"),
  .startdate = NULL,
  .stopdate = NULL,
  .organkey = "organkey"
)

Arguments

data

data.frame. A data frame containing the variables describe in .patientkey and .date

stcs

list. The stcs object.

.organevent_category

chr. The event category to filter. Several choice between "Allograftdisease", "Complications", "Underlyingdisease"

.startdate

chr. The column name containing the starting date.

.stopdate

chr. The column name containing the stop date.

.organkey

chr. The column name containing organkey

Value

a data frame containing "organevent_category", "organevent", "organevent_comment", "n_occurence", "range".
